subtitle: The mystery of Christ is deeply ingrained within every human being
regardless of one's beliefs the idea of Christ is something that has touched the
depths of the human psyche since the beginning but few are those who truly
understand what this word points to and even fewer are those who get to experience
it Jesus is a man a master who became a living Christ he became crucified but the word Christ in
its purest meaning does not mean an individual man the word Christ deres from the Greek word
Christos the anointed one when people say Jesus Christ the word Christ is the title given to
master Jesus to indicate that he has incarnated the cosmic Force of Christ within himself in
this way Jesus represents the innermost being the Divine spark within each of us that force
is connected to the highest and most purest dimension of reality the absolute and it is
this christic substance which connects us to that Inner Space space because the ego cannot
experience the absolute only the Christ can the cosmic Christ is the solar aspect of the logos
the Divine spark within each human being the Christ is the mediator the bridge between the
absolute and the manifested universe Christ is beyond any personality or individuality
Christ only appears in this physical lower dense Material World when it expresses itself through
any human being who is prepared to receive it but the process to become Chrisi is not easy
it is the most difficult task that any human being can undertake this is why Jesus played
out an elaborate drama throughout his christic process or crucifixion the symbolism behind the
crucifixion runs very deep it symbolizes the final death one must take in order to
die finally to all ego there are many spiritual teachings and schools that talk of how beautiful
Enlightenment is but no other symbol conveys the reality of it better than the crucifixion or the
cross there are several Masters who are also crustified but their process happened
in internally Master Jesus lived through this process externally as a symbolic teaching for
those who understand the hidden meanings behind what he went through in the Gnostic teachings we
have an elaborate map of this process called the three mountains which outlines all of the
processes of initiation that an Adept must go through in order to reach the next Parts on the
path and it is at the top of the second Mountain specifically where one experiences
full crustification the first mountain is simply a preparation for the second Mountain to test if
the initiate is ready to descend into their inner darkness in order to illuminate their
psychological Hells usually people would assume that a spiritual Master is free from ego but the
reality is a master is someone who knows every corner of the egoic psyche they know the science
of sin the second mountain is very difficult because it is a process where ego is always
seen it is always observed it is an exploration of the inner Hells in a conscious way a conscious
dissension this is why Jesus said at the heights of his inner work father why have you forsaken
me those words reflect the Deep anguish and suffering that Jesus endured while
experiencing so much inner Darkness the crucifixion represents this process of
inner transformation and the sacrifice of the ego when Jesus cried this out he was
expressing the pain of separation from his own inner Divinity the disconnection from his own
being due to the burden of the christic process and experiencing the collective
Karma and weight of the sins of humanity this sort of Divine weeping serves as a reminder for
us to reflect upon our own spiritual state it is a call to awaken our Consciousness to
recognize our own inner disconnection from our Divine Essence and to strive towards the path of
self-realization on the first Mountain the initiate learns little things about themselves
from time to time some negative desires their laziness their anger Etc but on the second
Mountain we are shown hundreds more constantly this is for the initiate to exercise death of
all egoic patterns within himself to sacrifice everything within in order to experience true
self transformation this requires tremendous spiritual willpower it requires the force of
Christ in other words it requires Supreme compassion and understanding one cannot die
for oneself but true death only comes when it is done for others this is a christic mystery
and this is why the christic process is so difficult because one's compassion becomes
tested through the adversities of life through betrayals through slander through Temptations
Etc in order to see if the initiate truly loves Humanity to see if the initiate loves
and understands even their own enemies and amidst the worst of these adversities and
betrayals if you're still able to forgive and sacrifice then one progresses spiritually very
fast in this way the force of Christ is the most revolutionary force on this planet it can overcome
any obstacle any internal or external challenge in this way forgiveness is a form of how my
magic that is why it is said that Christ will save the world and the sins of the planet but
people mistakenly and sincerely confuse this with the personality of the man Jesus indeed Jesus is a
powerful master who helps us but it is inaccurate to think that we can still reach Liberation
through living unconscious as long as we pray for forgiveness this is what many people do today but
no true forgiveness true Redemption is found by seeking out the Christ within yourself and
putting it into practice into lived thoughts and actions that is true sacrifice the highest form
of love that there is it is much better to connect to the Christ in this way instead of just through
prayer the practice of Christ is a practice of sacrifice which endows the highest form of
human understanding to learn to die within oneself to conquer oneself completely and
overcome one's illusory inner World in order to find out that which is real that which is
eternal not based on desires memories or dreams you see what exists within each of
us is the entire human race along with the entire human psyche and that includes the
depths of the unconscious mind in order to die to all of that unconsciousness one
needs Supreme transcendental love within themselves like killing the ego with the
crushing force of kindness compassion and understanding therefore anyone who has truly
died to all their ego does in turn love all of humanity because Humanity represents the human
psyche in this way when one becomes a light to themselves they become Alik
to others naturally when you illuminate the unconscious parts of your psyche you
become Alik to others externally too but the Christ is not just a light that illuminates
it's a fire which annihilates the darkness completely it reveals the truth of reality
whether we like it or not that is why Jesus representing the Christ said I have come to
send fire on the earth if someone is near me he will burn I am the fire that blazes whoever
is near me is near fire whoever is far from me is far from life and inry with its inner Latin
meaning of ignis Natura renovat Integra which means Through Fire one's inner nature can be
restored this all holds profound significance for our own spiritual journey many people are
often challenged by how to overcome ego taking years through several methods and
while techniques can work in the end the only Superior power to overcome
ego is the power or force of which is known as christic love or love that
comes from fire love that comes from internal understanding compassion and
sacrifice which inevitably is all intimately related to the fire of the Divine mother
Kundalini can you say that you can let others freely be and choose whatever they want while
you take up the path of Awakening can you say that you love others without controlling them
can you say you know how to love someone even when they are insulting you can you say that
you put yourself in other people's shoes and try to understand them when they are angry or acting
unconsciously can you practice kindness even when one acts as a tyrant towards you can you still
love someone even when they have betrayed you or have committed the worst crimes against you
if the answer to these questions is no then the ego is still deeply rooted within you you choose
to listen to the reactionary voices of demons instead of sacrificing those voices in order to
listen to The Voice of Truth to the for force of Christ that easily overcomes all of those kinds of
Temptations the Christ is a reminder to remember to recognize the ego in ourselves and die to it
and even if we see the ego in others to forgive it since to do that it is to recognize that at the
root of all ego is pain and suffering and everyone is suffering in some way or another it does not
hurt to be kind warmhearted and compassionate but it does hurt our own ego because it is the
christic fire that we are exercising in those moments and it is important to understand that
we don't just forgive in order to be good or saintly but that it is an act of intelligent
recognition of letting go of perpetuating egoic patterns in this world if you cannot forgive
others externally then you perpetuate some kind of spiritual limitation within yourself you can pray
and meditate for many hours every day but it won't make so much of a difference compared to how much
you can embrace the christic force from moment to moment in daily life amidst life's adversities and
relationships as we've just been reflecting on it takes great spiritual energy in order
to truly live with the energy of Christ to live in a state from moment to moment that connects
us with the conscious ious of the cosmic Christ there's a particular Mantra that can strengthen
us for this and at the same time help us to invoke more of this christic energy in order
to handle the pain of everyday existence and to accelerate the Awakening of our own individual
Consciousness to do this practice you should sit down in a comfortable position take some
deep breaths and free of external distractions turn your senses inwards close your eyes and
with a Serene Mind Body totally relaxed when you are ready when you feel a certain degree
of Stillness that Inner Space within start chanting vocally or mentally the mantra
and just keep repeating that Mantra this is the vowel of the solop plexus chakra and as
you do this with your awareness perfectly con concentrated on the Mantra begin to see
with your mind's eye the sun in your solar plexus nourishing your soul and in front of you a cross
of light showering your solar plexus feeding it with the nourishment of the cosmic substance of
Christ you may also see a rose opening within the center of this Cross of Lights do this
profound practice for 1 hour a day sincerely striving towards the christic light and you
will begin to experience a profound shift in Consciousness the reason why this is done in
the solar plexus is because the sun governs this chakra the sun represents the cosmic Christ which
nourishes and sustains the soul it is a powerful symbol of resurrection and transformation as it
rises each day bringing light to the darkness in the same way the christic energy awakens
within us bringing light to the darkness of our ignorance and leading us to Spiritual Awakening
and Enlightenment by harnessing the Solar Force within ourselves through this practice we can
awaken the christic energy and experience this divine presence within us you can also reflect
on the journey that Kundalini must take through the chakras as it attempts to ascend to the heart
before Kundalini can enter the heart it has to pass through the solar plexus however the solar
plexus is intimately related with our ego and willpower the solar plexus is the chief of the
three lower inferior chakras and is therefore the Throne of the ego it is the seat of the
eye this is why in order to authentically awaken this chakra in a positive way one needs christic
energy one needs to know how to deny their own unconscious will so through this practice we can
transform our willpower from unconsciously preserving the ego and instead dissolve it
through this kind of internal sacrifice we slowly acquire higher will or conscious willpower to let
thy will of our inner being to be done and not the will of the ego to let the Christ
Prevail we must consciously and decisively reject the ego's negative qualities such as
Pride Envy lust anger greed Etc this requires constant vigilance and a sincere desire for
inner change and as one continues they develop an intimate relationship relationship with the
Christ whenever one is awakened in the inner worlds in the astral worlds one recognizes the
christic Consciousness enabling them to be aware spontaneously with Wonder from moment
to moment just as a child sees the world this is only possible because of the Christ and as
one continues dayto day in their practices as the ego diminishes the Christ within us can manifest
its virtues more and more such as love compassion wisdom humility Etc through the death of the ego
the Christ can fully awaken and guide our thoughts feelings and actions leading us gradually towards
spiritual Liberation and Union with the Divine and as your devotion continues day to day this
conscious willpower in the solar plexus keeps the Divine Flame the Light of Christ alive in the
heart
